nonce.description: Unique NONCE identifier with timestamp and random hex

prev_manifest_sha256.description: SHA-256 of previous manifest for chain integrity

path.description: File path relative to repository root, must start with evidence/

full_sha256.description: Full SHA-256 hash of file content

mtime.description: File modification time in ISO 8601 format

artifacts.description: Map of artifact identifiers to file metadata

total_files.description: Total number of files in manifest

total_size.description: Total size of all files in bytes

manifest_sha256.description: Self-hash of manifest content (excluding this field)
